## Client.search() method

Perform a search in Doofinder based on the provided parameters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
search(params: Query | SearchParams): Promise<SearchResponse>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>Query &#124; SearchParams</code> | An instance of <code>Query</code> or an object with valid search parameters. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<SearchResponse>`

A promise to be fullfilled with the response or rejected with a `ClientResponseError`<!-- -->.
